price: Àwọn ipò yóò wà fún ẹnì kọ̀ọ̀kan nípa iṣẹ́ tí wọ́n ṣe níṣẹ́. Àti pé (èyí rí bẹ́ẹ̀) nítorí kí (Allāhu) lè san wọ́n ní ẹ̀san iṣẹ́ wọn ní ẹ̀kúnrẹ́rẹ́. Àwa kò sì níí ṣàbòsí sí wọn.
arabic: وَلِكُلّٖ دَرَجَٰتٞ مِّمَّا عَمِلُواْۖ وَلِيُوَفِّيَهُمۡ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ وَهُمۡ لَا يُظۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: walikullin darajātun mimmā ʿamilū waliyuwaffiyahum aʿmālahum wahum lā yuẓ'lamūna
translations: and that He may fully compensate them
